Ok

Well do


Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for thin=
gs you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On =
Dec 14, 2011, at 2:21 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

=
> OOC: Actually you're going to need to repost that one Sandy. Tuscon
> has=
 no knowledge that Drill Bit and Vice Grip are there together.
> 
> As far =
as Tuscon knows Vice Grip has been either dead or missing for
> years and w=
hile it is possible that Tuscon MIGHT know who Drill Bit is
> (I will leave=
 that up to you and Adam to puzzle out) he would have no
> knowledge that a=
 rebuilt Vice grip was along with him.
> 
> It's up to you but I can imagin=
e that Tuscon might even wonder why
> Drill Bit is even there since when Tu=
scon left to the Jungle to look
> for Rodimus the Maximals and Predacons we=
re still pretty still at odds
> with each other. Leo Prime had to finish wh=
at Tuscon had started.
> 
> As a side note, none of the Maximals should be =
aware of Vice Grip or
> Drillbit since they have been hidden from the begin=
ning of this joint
> venture.
> 
> Anyways, I leave the reposting to you :)=

> 
> - Preston
> 
> On 12/14/11, Sandy Panico <magicquartz@...> wrot=
e:
> > Tucson could see but could not determine who Drill Bit was. Yet he k=
new he
> > had to get a closer look to get an idea who the Cybertronian was=
. He
> > carefully moves closer to him, and to the point where he could see=
 who he
> > was.
> >
> > " Drill Bit? Over here, it's me, Tucson Prime. Is =
Vice Grip with you?"
> >
> > Don't be envious of what you don't have, be gr=
ateful for things you already
> > posses. Nothing is worth more than family=
 and friends.
> >
>

      <p>OOC: Actually you're going to need to repost that=
 one Sandy. Tuscon<br>
has no knowledge that Drill Bit and Vice Grip are th=
ere together.<br>
<br>
As far as Tuscon knows Vice Grip has been either dea=
d or missing for<br>
years and while it is possible that Tuscon MIGHT know =
who Drill Bit is<br>
(I will leave that up to you and Adam to puzzle out) h=
e would have no<br>
knowledge that a rebuilt Vice grip was along with him.<=
br>
<br>
It's up to you but I can imagine that Tuscon might even wonder why=
<br>
Drill Bit is even there since when Tuscon left to the Jungle to look<b=
r>
for Rodimus the Maximals and Predacons were still pretty still at odds<b=
r>
with each other. Leo Prime had to finish what Tuscon had started.<br>
<b=
r>
As a side note, none of the Maximals should be aware of Vice Grip or<br>=

Drillbit since they have been hidden from the beginning of this joint<br>

venture.<br>

Anyways, I leave the reposting to you :)<br>
